org.eng.aisp.util

Class BinaryConfusionMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.aisp.util.BinaryConfusionMatrix

  • public class BinaryConfusionMatrix
extends Object
    An of true/false positives/negatives to provide error metrics on a binary classifier. Metric definitions taken from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Precision_and_recall.
    Author:
    eduardo.morales
